verses.text: Doth thy \w thought|strong="H0559"\w* \w seem|strong="H2803"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H0559"\w* thou shouldst \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* am more \w just|strong="H6664"\w* than \w God|strong="H0410"\w*?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* thou saidst: \w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* right doth \w not|strong="H3588"\w* please thee: \w or|strong="H3276"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H4100"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* thee \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*?

Therefore \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w words|strong="H4405"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w friends|strong="H7453"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee.

\w Look|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sky|strong="H8064"\w*, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H7834"\w* \w higher|strong="H1361"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* thee.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* shalt thou hurt \w him|strong="H6213"\w*? \w and|strong="H2398"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thy iniquities be \w multiplied|strong="H7231"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* shalt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w do|strong="H4100"\w* justly, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* shalt thou \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?

Thy \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* hurt \w a|strong="H3644"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* help \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w By|strong="H7230"\w* reason \w of|strong="H7230"\w* \w the|strong="H7230"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H7230"\w* \w oppressions|strong="H6217"\w* \w they|strong="H6217"\w* shall \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w*: \w and|strong="H2199"\w* shall wail \w for|strong="H7768"\w* \w the|strong="H7230"\w* violence \w of|strong="H7230"\w* \w the|strong="H7230"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w of|strong="H7230"\w* tyrants.

\w And|strong="H3915"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Where|strong="H0335"\w* \w is|strong="H0433"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w*, \w who|strong="H0559"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w who|strong="H0559"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w songs|strong="H2158"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H0776"\w* teacheth \w us|strong="H0502"\w* more than \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* instructeth \w us|strong="H0502"\w* more than \w the|strong="H0776"\w* fowls \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* air.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hear, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* men.

\w God|strong="H0410"\w* therefore \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w look|strong="H7789"\w* into \w the|strong="H8085"\w* causes \w of|strong="H0410"\w* every \w one|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Yea|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w He|strong="H3588"\w* considereth \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w be|strong="H3808"\w* judged \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* expect \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w bring|strong="H3045"\w* \w on|strong="H6258"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* fury, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* doth \w he|strong="H3588"\w* revenge wickedness \w exceedingly|strong="H3966"\w*.

Therefore \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* openeth \w his|strong="H0347"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* multiplieth \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w without|strong="H1097"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.
